ygData.subject: Re: Battle of the Titans

Tyrael shot at Maxima, right in the torso. Then, he began laughing, as
if from a joke.

Tyrael: You? My Ancestor?!? I think not! You see, we Tripredacus are
descended from a different lineage than Maximals and Predacons. Even
before the great wars, we left Cybertron, not without looking at it,
mind you, but to develop elsewhere. We thrived, but we desired the
power to rule Cybertron and show what has always been... But that is
not for me to tell you.

He swung swiftly to his left where Hydras stood and sent a series of
spears at his nemesis.

Tyrael: Do you mind? We're dueling...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/11/03 7:27:11 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> Proudwing500k@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Tyrael: I admit it. No Decepticon was ever a slave. Too stubborn and
> > violent to be one, and way too deceptive. But you will never be the
> > power you once were. Clinging to that fading dream is futile and vain.
> > It wastes your efforts. Whatever plan Alpha Trion had for you, it
> > might not be one that includes giving you commands. You play the part
> > he has given you, just as I am playing a part given to me by my
ancestors.
> > 
> > He raises a hand and unleashes a massive surge of coherent light at
> > Maxima.
> > 
> > 
> 
> Falling to her weakened knees. This was becoming more than she could
bear. 
> Feeling the pain shooting through her. She would not use whatever
powers may 
> have been given to her. 
> 
> She glared up at Tyrael. "If you know so much about me, & what Alpha
Trion 
> wishes of me, why do I not know?!" she spat. "Besides... I am one of
your bloody 
> damn ancestors!" she cringed. She was no direct foremother of his, but 
> surely, the vast majority of these bots & cons she was much older,
though easy 
> enough for her to change & grow & adjust. Though at times, she
didn't like it or 
> hesitated. She changed nonetheless. 
> 
> She grabbed more strength. She wanted to show she was stronger than
any had 
> thought.
> 
> Struggling, she finally came to her feet again. Panting, "Eeehhh...
Tyrael. 
> Again, Alpha Trion does NOT govern my future, just as he did not
govern my 
> past. He was an Autobot. I am a Decepticon." An evil grin appeared
upon her face 
> as her crimson optics glowed. "Actually, I truly enjoyed torturing
him often... 
> even with the demise of Elita-1. Oh, the pain from both Optimus
Prime & Alpha 
> Trion was priceless." she purred wickedly.
